meanings.definition: A U-shaped structure used in snowboarding and skateboarding.
meanings.sent1: The skater practiced tricks on the halfpipes at the skate park.
meanings.sent2: The snowboarder glided smoothly down the halfpipes at the competition.
meanings.sent3: The halfpipes at the park were so steep, they made me dizzy just looking at them!
meanings.sent4: Her determination to conquer the halfpipes was as strong as steel.
meanings.sent5: The halfpipes towered like giant waves in the ocean, ready to be conquered by skilled riders.
